name: Doesn't Jibe
description:
E’Peachyband:

Artist:

SoFarAway // Ignatyev Gleb

Scenario & Gamedesign:

favanbowv

Composer:

Jujo // Vadim Malahanov

Programmers:

CATANYAW // Dmitry Svyatash

peachyhead // Chalov Vasily

This game is also submited for ludum dare 49 gamejam

oh-oh, it seems that this student’s brain is completely broken from overwork! It seems that without your help he cannot write a coursework. What are the deadlines? Ah, by tomorrow morning………..

So you see these thoughts floating around in your brain, devoid of any connection? For this student to be able to perform certain actions, you must link thoughts to each other using the left mouse button. To earn points for a coursework, you need to link the thoughts given to it. You can earn or lose several points for such a connection. You can link up to four elements in total.

Don't try to associate bad thoughts, they can hurt you. And do not forget to check your pulse, you need to keep it calm with the left mouse button, heart rate control starts from 20 points of coursework

P.S. We apologize for the huge size of the game... we are working on it :)

P.S.S. If you have missed connections, you can always clear them. By pressing the upper right button

Connections to earn points:

coursework+monitor = +4points

coursework+tea = +2points

coffee+energy drink = x4points

You can try to stop on these, but you won'tlast long without others.

Good Luck!
